Nerangs.ab: frawarānag čē gāh darēd u-š pad bē nigerišn aziš wāz kunišn
"(He further recites) the frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and while looking (to the zōt) takes the wāz from him."
ParagnaLL1.1.7. (NP) Var. a (Mss. K7, RJ, K36, 31):
frauuarāne gāh ānče bid uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ xšnaoϑra ẏ• v• x• f• ẏaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā frāmē marūtē tā sar

"(He should recite) frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh (and with the šnūman) uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ xšnaoϑra ẏ• v• x• f• and the (wāz-gīrišnīh) ẏaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā frāmē marūtē until the end."
frauuarāne be-gāh-e hāvan āziran šāyad be gāh-e digar našāyad uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ x yas v• x• f• ẏaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā
"frauuarāne -the (gāh) hāvan and āziran are allowed, but none else- (with the šnūman) uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ x yas. v• x• f• (and the wāz) ẏaϑā ahū vairiiō zaotā."
fruuarāne gāh ān bid uruuariiā̊ vaŋuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aōniiā̊ vīša negaridan xšnaoϑra OD marotū.

"(He must further recite) the frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh (and with the šnūman) uruuariiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ He must look at the thicket (and recite) xšnāoθra until mraotū."

Quotations.ab: frauuarānē čē gāh dārēd uruuaraiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aōniiā̊ wēšag pad ēwkardagīh hamē be nigērišn u-š abāz āyišn u-š az zōt wāz gīrišn

"(He should recite) the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and (the šnūman) uruuaraiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aōniiā̊. He should look at the thicket as a whole, go back and take the wāz from the zōt."
frauuarāne mazdaiiasnō čē gāh dārēd u-š pad urwar uruuaraiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ xšnaōθra tā sar u-š wāz frāz gīrišn.
"(He should recite) the Frauuarāne with the corresponding gāh and (the šnūman) for the plants uruuaraiiā̊ vaŋhuiiā̊ mazdaδātaiiā̊ aṣ̌aoniiā̊ xšnaōθra until the end and he has to take the wāz."
